scripts.composerjs: cd composerjs && npm install && node app.js
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n "Webpack,PHP Server" -p "[{name}]" -c "green, blue" "NODE_ENV=dev webpack --watch --config config/server.js" "php -S localhost:9090"
scripts.build:dev: NODE_ENV=dev webpack --config config/webpack.dev.js && npm run icons && npm run favicon
scripts.build:prod: webpack --config config/webpack.prod.js && npm run icons && npm run favicon
